description.html:
I want to have CI testing for our ign-common1 and ign-msgs1 release branches. I added a separate data structure since the current one is also used by the install and debbuilder jobs.

Test looks ok:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_ignition/478/console

Added jobs:

    GeneratedJob{name='ignition_msgs-ci-ign-msgs1-xenial-amd64'}
    GeneratedJob{name='ignition_msgs-ci-ign-msgs1-trusty-amd64'}
    GeneratedJob{name='ignition_msgs-ci-ign-msgs1-zesty-amd64'}
    GeneratedJob{name='ignition_common-ci-ign-common1-xenial-amd64'}
    GeneratedJob{name='ignition_common-ci-ign-common1-trusty-amd64'}
    GeneratedJob{name='ignition_common-ci-ign-common1-zesty-amd64'}
    GeneratedJob{name='ignition_msgs-ci-ign-msgs1-homebrew-amd64'}
    GeneratedJob{name='ignition_common-ci-ign-common1-homebrew-amd64'}
    GeneratedJob{name='ignition_msgs-ci-ign-msgs1-windows7-amd64'}
    GeneratedJob{name='ignition_common-ci-ign-common1-windows7-amd64'}

title.raw: Test common1 and msgs1 branches in CI
